Open Source Software

Rack Flags

Simple cookie-based feature flags using Rack. Find it on Rubygems.

LazyDoc

Embedded JSON Documents for POROs. Find it on Rubygems.

Ng Inspect Watchers

A Chrome Extension to inspect the watchers in an Angular app. Find it in the Chrome Web Store.

The EOD Machine

Automate End of Day update emails among distributed teams. Download from Github.
